snippet.title: Butcher Valley -  Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet Nora the human and Louie the fox, two adventurers looking for a good time. They are on their way to the port of Oak Angel, but trouble always find it's way.
Nora and Louie are now stranded in the middle of the forest, luckly they're now near the village of Butcher Valley, home to pine trees and plenty of strange folks. Do whatever it takes to get them to safety, but be careful, Butcher Valley doesn't take kindly to strangers.

Made by SightCel from Papeero, a 2D adventure-platformer set in the strange village of Butcher Valley. Monuments, cakes and many boss battles. Get your mug of hot cocoa and your slice of cake ready because this adventure is one of a kind.
Make sure to follow Papeero to get more content like this! keep an eye for updates and new projects, THANK YOU FOR VISITING!


Download the game:
Itch.io: https://papeero.itch.io/butcher-valley
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/butcher-valley/642248

See other video games:
Itch.io: https://papeero.itch.io/
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/@Papeero

Trailer Editor:
Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ0sEbgp6KgQx2I-ExcGQYA
